name: Internal Medicine
description: Comprehensive care for adult patients with focus on prevention, diagnosis, and treatment of internal diseases

name: Family Medicine
description: Primary healthcare for patients of all ages, providing comprehensive and continuous medical care

name: Endocrinology
description: Specialized care for hormone-related disorders including diabetes, thyroid, and metabolic conditions

name: Cardiology
description: Heart and cardiovascular system care including preventive cardiology and cardiac interventions

name: Pulmonology
description: Respiratory system care including asthma, COPD, lung disease diagnosis and treatment

name: General Surgery
description: Surgical procedures for various conditions including emergency and elective operations

name: Dentistry
description: Oral health care including preventive, restorative, and cosmetic dental procedures

name: Ophthalmology
description: Eye and vision care including comprehensive eye exams, disease treatment, and surgical procedures
